<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/webplugins"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds a web plugin from a file to the current portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"system","in":"query","description":"Specifies whether to load the system plugins or not.","schema":{"type":"boolean","example":true}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
